SpinDec2
Modelling Spinodal Decomposition

grid Module Reference

Grid module contains subroutines to initialise grid related variables and allocate and deallocate memories for different grids used in the software. More...

Functions/Subroutines

subroutine, public get_seed (seed_in)
 Subroutine to set random seed based on user input. If -1 is inputed for seed, a random seed is generated, otherwise the user provided seed is used. More...

 Subroutine to output a random number from a uniform distribution between user provided lower and upper bound values. More...

Detailed Description

Grid module contains subroutines to initialise grid related variables and allocate and deallocate memories for different grids used in the software.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

◆ get_seed()

subroutine, public grid::get_seed ( integer  seed_in)

Subroutine to set random seed based on user input. If -1 is inputed for seed, a random seed is generated, otherwise the user provided seed is used.

Parameters
seed_inUser inputted seed value

Subroutine to deallocate memory of global concentration grids.

Parameters
my_rankCurrent MPI rank

◆ grid_init()

subroutine grid::grid_init ( real(real64), dimension(nx, ny), intent(out)  grid,
integer, intent(in)  Nx,
integer, intent(in)  Ny,
real(real64), intent(in)  min,
real(real64), intent(in)  max,
integer, intent(in), optional  burn 
)

Subroutine to initialise a given grid using values sampled from a uniform distribution with a given lower and upper bound.

Parameters
grid2D grid to be populated with random values
NxGrid size in x-direction
NyGrid size in y-direction
minUser inputted lower bound for uniform distribution
maxUser inputted upper bound for uniform distribution
burn(Optional) Parameter to burn initial seed values

◆ grid_initialise_local()

subroutine, public grid::grid_initialise_local ( integer, intent(in)  Nx,
integer, intent(in)  Ny,
real(real64), intent(in)  c_min,
real(real64), intent(in)  c_max,
real(real64), intent(in)  T_min,
real(real64), intent(in)  T_max,
character(len=128), intent(in)  problem,
integer, intent(in)  p,
integer, intent(in)  my_rank,
integer, dimension(2), intent(in)  my_rank_coords 
)

Subroutine to calculate grid subdomain size, allocate needed memory for local concentration, Q, and M, and mu grids and allocate memory for corresponding halos.

Parameters
NxGrid size in x-direction
NyGrid size in y-direction
c_minUser inputted miniumum for initial concentration distribution
c_maxUser inputted maximum for initial concentration distribution
T_minUser inputted miniumum for initial temperature distribution
T_maxUser inputted miniumum for initial temperature distribution
problemUser inputted problem type
pNumber of processors requested for parallel run
my_rankCurrent process' MPI rank
my_rank_coordsX and Y rank coordinates of the current process
